title: Bug 116564: Hyperlink builder title changes with settings instead of being 'Hyperlink Options'
OB: When the user clicks on 'OK' and then reopens the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that the title of the hyperlink builder becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on 'OK' in the hyperlink builder.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
